nodes.text: The Prosperous was a Providence-class Dreadnought that served in the naval forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems. During the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy, the Prosperous participated in the Battle of Coruscant in the final year of the war. Amid the battle, the Prosperous was captured by Republic forces from the Star Destroyer Impavid under the leadership of Jedi General Saesee Tiin.

The Prosperous was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the fifty-eighth issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published in 2016. The Prosperous first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "Chapter 23" of the Star Wars: Clone Wars animated series, which aired on March 26, 2005.
